content: this pattern uses a 5mm hook and 2 strands of thread or embroidery floss and is designed to accompany a lively little toad made using a 5mm hook and 6 strands of embroidery floss as seen in photos a lively little toad pattern is not included but is available for sale on ravelry and etsy pattern is beginner-friendly using basic stitches and demonstrating many steps with photos other sizes coming soon
